name: Avant-Garde
summary: Avant-Garde is a game where you play as an artist in 19th century Paris. Create paintings, meet artists like Monet, Picasso and Dali, participate in artistic movements such as impressionism and surrealism or even create your own movement.
info:
• 中文名: 大艺术家
  • 开发: AD1337
  • 平台: Flash, Web
  • 游戏类型: 模拟/RPG
  • 游戏引擎: Adobe Flash Professional
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2013年3月4日
  • 售价: 免费
